This folder contains many examples of handlers or events that can be used in lambda-local.

For more events examples, check out:
- https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/eventsources.html
- https://github.com/ashiina/lambda-local/tree/develop/test/functs
- https://github.com/ashiina/lambda-local/tree/develop/test/events
